record.label: edit.field
record.comments: strip off blanks & set field up for maint

statements.statements: $db.type=4 in $du.field.index in field in $dbdict;$db.type1=str($db.type)

if (substr(1 in $du.field.index in field in $dbdict, 1, 3)=" ") then (name in $dbfield=substr(1 in $du.field.index in field in $dbdict, 3*2 in $du.field.index in field in $dbdict+1, lng(1 in $du.field.index in field in $dbdict) - 3*2 in $du.field.index in field in $dbdict)) else (name in $dbfield=1 in $du.field.index in field in $dbdict)
$db.default=NULL;$du.save.field=$du.field.index in field in $dbdict
if (substr($db.type1, 1, 1)="{") then ($db.default=str(1 in $db.type);$db.type="UNKNOWN TYPE-REENTER")
if (substr($db.type1, 2, 1)="\"" and $db.default~=NULL) then ($db.type=2)
if (substr($db.type1, 2, 1)="'" and $db.default~=NULL) then ($db.type=3)
if ($db.default="true" or $db.default="false" or $db.default="unknown") then ($db.type=4)
if (substr(str($db.type), 1, 1)="U" and $db.default~=NULL) then ($db.type=1)
type in $dbfield=$db.type
db2.field.name in $dbfield=5 in $du.field.index in field in $dbdict
db2.length in $dbfield=7 in $du.field.index in field in $dbdict
if (val(str($db.type))~=NULL) then (type in $dbfield=$db.type in $type.array)
level in $dbfield=2 in $du.field.index in field in $dbdict
index in $dbfield=3 in $du.field.index in field in $dbdict
if ($du.file.empty=false and type in $dbfield~="array" and type in $dbfield~="structure") then ($du.type.display=true) else ($du.type.display=false)
struct.array.options in $dbfield=9 in $du.field.index in field in $dbdict
1 in sql.field.options in $dbfield=1 in 8 in $du.field.index in field in $dbdict
2 in sql.field.options in $dbfield=2 in 8 in $du.field.index in field in $dbdict
3 in sql.field.options in $dbfield=3 in 8 in $du.field.index in field in $dbdict
4 in sql.field.options in $dbfield=4 in 8 in $du.field.index in field in $dbdict
